attributes.review: My grandpa is a trump supporter and loves trump with all his heart. So once my grandpa got his first cellphone i helped my grandpa get this app. A week after downloading the app he hated it! Not only did the app take days to download (mind you any other app we tried to download took a few seconds to download) but it was very glitchy. My grandpa was very disappointed with how unprofessional this app is. And i’m so upset that this gave my grandpa with high blood pressure so much stress. I really don’t like this app and i just thought i should express how i felt.
attributes.title: horrible app

attributes.review: everytime i opened the app, my dog would go to the store. he would say he was going to get milk but he never came back. so i kept getting new dogs, but every time i would open the app, they would go to store to “get milk”. i have lost 69 dogs due to this app. then harry styles came over and gave me a dog named carrots. then i took a chance and opened the app and THEN MY POOR CARROTS LEFT TOO. HE JUMPED IN A MICROWAVE AND THEN WENT TO GET GOAT MILK FROM ARGENTINA. MY POOR POOR CARROTS. now i have to break the news to harry. but he just proposed so i hope he won’t change his mind now that i’ve lost his carrots DUE TO THIS APP.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: I downloaded this app just to see our Cheeto leader but instead I opened the app and it asked me to give my personal info and I find that very offensive because I just want to see the Cheeto but I put in all my personal information in anyway and once I finished the Cheeto himself came to my door with his 739 clones of himself and then they found out I was buying all the Cheetos at the grocery store and was hiding them in my basement so they barged into my house to retrieve them and I am now scared for life do not get this app
attributes.title: I’m disappointed in my Cheeto leader😤

attributes.review: this is the worst app i have ever downloaded. it will factory reset your phone and then fill your camera roll with pictures of donald trump. after scrolling through these photos, i immediately started projectile vomiting and having explosive diarrhea for 3 days straight because i was so disgusted. i went to the hospital and i was told i have one of the worst cases of trumpicitis in history. after spending some time on the tik tok app, the best app ever created, i finally recovered. do NOT download this app. it should be banned from the app store.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review:
As soon as I opened the app it told me that it would give me FREE ROBUX if I told them the password. I told them the password ofc.. I tried to log into my account but I COULDN’T 😾😾😾
I told my mommy abt the situation but she told me to shut up and she left me alone in the house because she wanted to go to daddy #11’s house 😿 I cried for YEARS, I was devastated cause I couldn’t talk to my 4 boyfriends in Roblox, Jason, Jake, Juan, and Jerry 😿😿😿 My Libra Moon is rising 👁👄💧👁 and I’m going to turn into an alpha when it fully rises 😼 You better be ready when I go to the White House and attack you, HISSSSSSS 😾😾😾😾
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER 😿

attributes.review: I downloaded this app not thinking and not was I horrified by the consequences of my actions. As soon as I opened it it caused an orange tint to my phone screen that just won’t go away. Siri now randomly screams at my weird thinks like “trump 2020”, “all lives matter, and “build a wall”! My Twitter feed will never be the same since now my autocorrect never works and I am constantly misspelling things. It’s almost like my phone wants me to be uneducated! If you care for your phone health at all you will definitely not utilize this app!!!
attributes.title: Stained my phone

attributes.title: HAHA

attributes.review: I know you have to really try sometimes, but the content on this app is out of control. The elephant really put it off for me. Like, why? I don’t understand why you need to post pictures like that. Especially because you’re the president like have some decency? I was very excited for this app and even had my kids download it too but I can’t believe you would ever call something family friendly and have content like this...I am truly...disgusted. Ugh.  I knew I didn’t like rump for a reason
attributes.title: Omg....I really tried

attributes.review: be careful!! do NOT download this app! as soon as i even DOWNLOADED it, my phone started glitching like NEVER BEFORE!🙀the screen of my phone started flashing black and white and then it suddenly shut down! i waited about five seconds before the screen turned orange and then HIS face appeared! DONALD! he was laughing😂 at me and calling me a loser! suddenly all my apps just DISAPPEARED and i lost EVERYTHING. all my phone can do now is say “trump 2020” and “grab her by the p****” which is just AWFUL! Be CAREFUL. if you don’t want to be haunted by donny, then DONT get it.
attributes.title: donald haunted me through my phone!

attributes.review: I open the app so excited to experience it. And there was a big Cheeto man that scared me and I dropped my phone then my dog saw it and threw up all over my floors. I wasn’t that surprised cause it was just that horrifying. Then I tried to delete it but there was this glitch and the cheeto man started popping up everywhere and I’m still trying to get puppy puke out of my carpets. So I left my phone out side to let it get some air and a flock of birds died because they glanced at the Cheeto. I’m still a little traumatized but I’m doing alright. Never download!!!!
